attributes.action: Publish all details of MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By publishing all details of MPs expenses the public will be able to scrutinize over the details. This way MPs will have to take more care to ensure they are not claiming for anything unjustified.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
